name: Red Light, Green Light
description:
Click on the game window and press any key to start.

Based on the children's game of the same name, which I remember playing in elementary school gym class. Created for One Button Jam 2016 in the span of about a week.

Up to four players, each controlling a box to get to the trophy at the end. Tap the button labeled on the box to make it move. Go as fast as you can, but if you move in the red light, you die! Patience is key.

The light-letting windows are randomly generated each time, so this game has replay value. ;)

(No audio)
